oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Oak Ridge Town Council
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eleven men are posing for a portrait. Six are standing and five are seated in student desks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Meetings; Oak Ridge Town Council
Baker, B. E.; Bledsoe, James E.; Bohannan, Barney; Hodge, Allen; Keesee, Robert C.; Marshall, Joseph A.; McCarthy, Thomas F. X.; Ridenour, George; Rodes, T. William; Schwenn, Marvin F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of October 18, 1945. Front row, James E. Bledsoe, B. E. Baker, Joseph A. Marshall, Marvin F. Schwenn, Thomas F. X. McCarthy. Back row, Allen Hodge, Barney Bohannan, George Ridenour, T. William Rodes, Robert C. Keesee. In that image, eleven men are pictured, but only ten are identified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
